## ObjectKey type

Type utility that determines the key type for an object, array, or string. Used by the [keys()](./type-object.keys.md) function to provide type-safe key extraction.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ObjectKey<T> = T extends NotIterable ? never : T extends string | Array<any> ? number & keyof T : keyof T;
```
**References:** [NotIterable](./type-object.notiterable.md)

## Example


```ts
type Keys = ObjectKey<{ a: number; b: string }>; // 'a' | 'b'
```
